name: Bolt-Shift
description: Bolt-Shift is a retro-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot, proudly representing the WebtrES club. With its soldier-like box body, rocket-powered arms and legs, and a striking red and black screen, Bolt-Shift is a formidable presence in the digital realm. This robot combines the nostalgia of classic gaming consoles with the advanced technology of modern oscilloscopes, making it a unique and powerful member of the WebtrES club.
